description:
Staff Accountant - 3 Month Contract to Hire- Fully Remote but must live in California. 

Pay up to $41 per hour w2 based on experience. 

P&L and Balance sheets needed- Reconciliations 

We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Staff Accountant to join our team in California. The ideal candidate will possess strong analytical skills, a solid understanding of accounting principles, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment. The Staff Accountant will play a crucial role in maintaining accurate financial records, preparing financial reports, and ensuring compliance with relevant regulations.
Responsibilities:
  • General Ledger Maintenance: Maintain general ledger accounts and reconcile balance sheet accounts to ensure accuracy and completeness.
  • Reconcile the eCommerce Division Monthly – Book Sales – Reconcile Cash Transactions – Shopify is a plus.
  • Budgeting and Forecasting: Assist in the preparation of forecasts
  • Tax Compliance: Support tax preparation activities, including gathering documentation and providing necessary information to 3rd Party Tax Processing Company
  • Compliance: Ensure compliance with relevant accounting standards, tax regulations, and company policies.
  • Process Improvement: Identify inefficiencies in existing processes and propose solutions for improvement to enhance accuracy and efficiency.
  • Ad Hoc Projects: Participate in special projects or initiatives as assigned by management, providing financial expertise and analysis as required.
Qualifications:
  • Bachelor’s degree in accounting, Finance, or related field.
  • 5+ years of experience in accounting or finance rolls
  • Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, SAP) and Microsoft Excel is a must (Pivot tables, VLOOKUP)
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to prioritize tasks and manage time effectively in a deadline-driven environment.
  • Knowledge of California tax regulations and compliance requirements is a plus.

Note: Any pay ranges displayed are estimations.  Actual pay is determined by an applicant's experience, technical expertise, and other qualifications as listed in the job description.  All qualified applicants are welcome to apply.

Yoh, a Day & Zimmermann company, is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

Visit https://www.yoh.com/applicants-with-disabilities to contact us if you are an individual with a disability and require accommodation in the application process.
